resources.string: Established about five years ago, Technology and Gaming Club, commonly known as TAG Club, has grown its reputation to become one of the most sought after clubs dealing with technical advancements and has established a monopoly in the sphere of Gaming and Game Development. \nWe are the hosts of one of the biggest \ne-gaming tournaments at college level, held bi-annually during the college\'s technical fest graVITas, in September and Riviera, the cultural fest, held in February.
Lorem Ipsum suggest an event lorem ipsum
Our operators are not available at the moment. Please leave a message and we will contact you soon.
We are the hosts of one of the biggest \ne-gaming tournaments at college level, held \nbi-annually during graVITas & Riviera.

VIT Gamers League provides a huge platform for amateurs and rookies to enter competitive tournaments without any fear and experience the true spirit of a gaming competition. We hope to set up a thrilling and fun filled experience for all the budding gamers.

An event held annually till now during the college\'s technical fest, graVITas, in September has grown in stature in the past few years to become one of the biggest e-sports tournament at college level all over India.\nIn just a short span of 5 years, Game-A-Thon has spearheaded our aim to encourage gaming among masses and also propagandize interest of students in the sphere of game development.

According to the rules of our renowned institution, students registering under 2 credits courses get extra 2 credits for it which is added in their overall credits which they have to finish. And TAG is one such club among all eminent clubs that offers 2 credit course. In order to fulfill all the criteria of students registering under 2 credit,firstly they need to register normally under it during course registration period. Secondly, they need to attend all the workshops and events conducted by TAG which will be considered for their attendance. They need to maintain the attendance of required minimum for passing 2 credits. Otherwise, you will be debarred and you need to re-register if you wish to have an extra credit through co-curricular basket.
